mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MYACTIVE_DONATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MYACTIVE_VOLUNTEER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MYACTIVE_EVENT WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.MYACTIVE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS MYACTIVE_DATE, M.MYACTIVE_DONATION_NO, D.DONATION_NO , M.DONATION_MONEY, D.DONATION_TITLE, D.DONATION_AMOUNT, D.DONATION_NO FROM MYACTIVE_DONATION M JOIN DONATION D ON M.DONATION_NO = D.DONATION_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY M.MYACTIVE_DONATION_NO DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.MYACTIVE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS MYACTIVE_DATE, V.VOLUNTEER_NO, M.MYACTIVE_VOLUNTEER_NO, V.VOLUNTEER_CONTENT, V.VOLUNTEER_TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_ADDR FROM MYACTIVE_VOLUNTEER M JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON V.VOLUNTEER_NO = M.VOLUNTEER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} ORDER BY M.MYACTIVE_VOLUNTEER_NO DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.MYACTIVE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS MYACTIVE_DATE, E.EVENT_NO , M.MYACTIVE_EVENT_NO , E.EVENT_TITLE FROM MYACTIVE_EVENT M JOIN EVENT E ON E.EVENT_NO = M.EVENT_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY M.MYACTIVE_EVENT_NO DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, CASE WHEN R.DONATION_NO IS NOT NULL THEN D.DONATION_TITLE WHEN R.VOLUNTEER_NO IS NOT NULL THEN V.VOLUNTEER_TITLE ELSE '제목 없음' END AS TITLE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.ENROLL_DATE, 'DD.MM.RR') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN DONATION D ON D.DONATION_NO = R.DONATION_NO LEFT JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON V.VOLUNTEER_NO = R.VOLUNTEER_NO WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO DESC
